meanings.definition: A South Asian dish consisting of vegetables or meat deep-fried in a spiced batter.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the crispy bhaji at the Indian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes delicious bhaji with potatoes and spices.
meanings.sent3: The bhaji was so tasty, it danced in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the bhaji filled the room, tempting everyone.
meanings.sent5: The golden bhaji sizzled in the hot oil, ready to be devoured.

meanings.definition: A type of Indian fritter made with vegetables such as onions or spinach.
meanings.sent1: The onion bhaji was a popular snack at the party.
meanings.sent2: I love the crispy texture of spinach bhaji.
meanings.sent3: The bhaji disappeared from the plate as soon as it was served.
meanings.sent4: The sizzle of the hot oil as the bhaji cooked was music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly fried bhaji made my mouth water instantly.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment or affection in Indian English.
meanings.sent1: Grandma always calls me her little bhaji.
meanings.sent2: In Indian culture, 'bhaji' is a sweet way to address someone.
meanings.sent3: My friend jokingly said, 'Hey, bhaji, pass me the chips!'
meanings.sent4: The word 'bhaji' felt like a warm hug in the form of a word.
meanings.sent5: Being called 'bhaji' by my aunt always brings a smile to my face.
